analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams @295b de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: By abiding in them, the bodhisattvas will attain the unsurpassed nature of the great wisdom of the tathagatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: these ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste /
translated: are the voices of the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?🔽They are as follows:🔽The bodhisattvas’ voice is gentle,

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad bde bar byed pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad bde bar byed pas /
translated: as it brings happiness to all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'jam pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'jam pa'o //
translated: It is soothing,

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems sim par byed pas /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems sim par byed pas /
translated: as it delights the minds of all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snyan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snyan pa'o //
translated: It is not false,🔽because it is understood as it really is.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed pas /🔽byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni mi rdzun pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed pas / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni mi rdzun pa'o //
translated: It is in accord with the truth,🔽because it does not speak falsely even in dreams.

original: rmi lam na yang log par mi smra bas /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: rmi lam na yang log par mi smra bas / byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: It is vast,

original: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad zil gyis gnon pas /
analyzed: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad zil gyis gnon pas /
translated: because it overwhelms all the lords of the gods, such as Indra and Brahma.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rgya che ba'o //
translated: It is the proclamation of a profound sound,🔽because it teaches the nature of reality.

original: chos kyi rang bzhin ston pas /🔽byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni zab mo'i dbyangs su sgrog pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin ston pas / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni zab mo'i dbyangs su sgrog pa'o //
translated: It is meaningful,🔽because all the teachings of the Dharma are inexhaustible.

original: chos bstan pa thams cad mi zad pas /
analyzed: chos bstan pa thams cad mi zad pas /
translated: It is in accord with the Dharma,🔽because it is understood as it is expressed.🔽It is in accord with the Vinaya,🔽because it is the basis for the training in higher moral discipline.🔽It is in accord with the Abhidharma,🔽because it is the basis for the training in wisdom.🔽It is in accord with the perfections,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the perfections.🔽It is in accord with the stages,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the stages.🔽It is in accord with the retentions,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the retentions.🔽It is in accord with the doors to liberation,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snying po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snying po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: because it is the basis for the training in the doors to liberation.🔽It is in accord with the emptiness of the conditioned,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽It is in accord with the emptiness of the unconditioned,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽It is in accord with the emptiness of the ultimate,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽It is in accord with the emptiness of the beginningless and endless,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.🔽It is in accord with the emptiness of non-rejection,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the emptiness of non-rejection.🔽It is in accord with the emptiness of inherent nature,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽It is in accord with the emptiness of all things,🔽because it is the basis for the training in the emptiness of all things.🔽It is in accord with the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: sgra ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par byed pas /
analyzed: sgra ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par byed pas /
translated: because it is the basis for the training in the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽It is in accord

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni shin tu gsal ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni shin tu gsal ba'o //
translated: The speech of the bodhisattvas is of different kinds,

original: dus dang las dang rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su ston pas /
analyzed: dus dang las dang rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su ston pas /
translated: because it teaches in accordance with the time, the action, and the ripening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rnam pa tha dad pa'o //🔽bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod pa @296a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rnam pa tha dad pa'o // bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod pa @296a *//
translated: The speech of the bodhisattvas is for the whole world,

original: la 'jug par byed pas /🔽byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'gro ba thams cad la bgro ba'o /
analyzed: la 'jug par byed pas / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'gro ba thams cad la bgro ba'o /
translated: because it engages in conduct in accordance with the thoughts.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste /
translated: aspects of the bodhisattvas’ speech.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: By relying on them, the bodhisattvas attain the thus-gone ones’ unsurpassed speech.🔽O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras; byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de yang las rnam par dag pa bcus yongs su sbyangs pa yin te /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras; byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de yang las rnam par dag pa bcus yongs su sbyangs pa yin te /
translated: That speech of the bodhisattvas is purified by ten kinds of pure action.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig sngon ma thos pa la mngon par mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas yongs su dag pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig sngon ma thos pa la mngon par mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas yongs su dag pa dang /
translated: It is to have a completely pure interest in the speech of the thus-gone ones. It is to have a completely pure interest in the bodhisattvas’ words that have never been heard before. It is to be completely pure by having abandoned all words that are unpleasant to beings.

original: sngon gyi mthar ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba dang mos pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi mthar ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba dang mos pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa /
translated: It is to be completely pure by being free from the four faults of speech from the distant past. It is to be completely pure by praising the thus-gone ones with great joy and interest. It is to be completely pure by praising the thus-gone ones with a loud voice.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / legs pa brjod pas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas sems can gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pas yongs su dag pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / legs pa brjod pas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas sems can gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pas yongs su dag pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang /
translated: It is to be completely pure by correctly and accurately describing the qualities and virtues of the buddhas. It is to be completely pure by attracting other beings with the gift of Dharma through one’s pure intentions. It is to be completely pure by singing songs of praise to the thus-gone ones with a melodious voice.

original: rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol @296b ba'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las mngon sum du chos thos nas /🔽rang gi lus 'bul bas yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos smra ba thams cad las chos thos nas rim gro bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol @296b ba'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las mngon sum du chos thos nas / rang gi lus 'bul bas yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos smra ba thams cad las chos thos nas rim gro bya ba'i phyir /
translated: It is purified by the offering of one’s own body to the bhagavat buddhas and by the offering of one’s own body to all the bodhisattvas who teach the Dharma in order to serve them.

original: bdag 'bul zhing snying thag pa nas yongs su gtong bas yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: bdag 'bul zhing snying thag pa nas yongs su gtong bas yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: It is purified by the offering of one’s own body to the bhagavat buddhas and by the offering of one’s own body to all the bodhisattvas who teach the Dharma in order to serve them.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni las rnam par dag pa bcu po de dag gis shin tu sbyangs par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni las rnam par dag pa bcu po de dag gis shin tu sbyangs par 'byung ngo //
translated: The bodhisattvas’ speech is purified by these ten pure actions.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag de ltar yongs su sbyangs pa de yang yongs su 'dzin pa bcus yongs su gzung bar 'byung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag de ltar yongs su sbyangs pa de yang yongs su 'dzin pa bcus yongs su gzung bar 'byung ste /
translated: The bodhisattvas’ speech, which is purified in this way, is also held by ten kinds of retention.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are those ten?

original: 'di ltar lha'i dbang po la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar lha'i dbang po la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin /
translated: In this way, it is held by all the gods, such as the lord of the gods and so forth.

original: klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin /
translated: It is held by the lords of the nāgas, the lords of the yakṣas, the lords of the gandharvas, the lords of the asuras, the lords of the garuḍas, the lords of the kinnaras, the lords of the mahoragas, and by all the gods belonging to the class of Brahmā, such as the lord of Brahmā and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang po la sogs pa chos su smra ba thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang po la sogs pa chos su smra ba thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin te /
translated: It is held by all the Dharma teachers, such as the Tathāgata Dharmaketu and so forth.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni yongs su 'dzin pa bcu po de dag gis @297a *//
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni yongs su 'dzin pa bcu po de dag gis @297a *//
translated: O Son of the Victorious One!🔽The speech of the bodhisattvas

original: shin tu gzung bar 'byung ngo //
analyzed: shin tu gzung bar 'byung ngo //
translated: arises as if held by these ten kinds of holders.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious One!

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de ltar shin tu gzung bar 'byung ba de yang dgos pa bcu yongs su grub par byed de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de ltar shin tu gzung bar 'byung ba de yang dgos pa bcu yongs su grub par byed de /
translated: “The bodhisattvas’ speech, which is thus very well-founded, accomplishes ten purposes.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mngon par dga' bar byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mngon par dga' bar byed do //
translated: It delights the realms of sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byed do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byed do //
translated: It is understood in the realms of the world.

original: dbang po'i khams la 'jug par byed do; ;mos pa'i khams rnam par dag par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po'i khams la 'jug par byed do; ;mos pa'i khams rnam par dag par byed do //
translated: It engages the realms of the faculties. It purifies the realms of interest.

original: nyon mongs pa'i khams sel bar byed do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i khams sel bar byed do //
translated: It eliminates the realms of afflictions.

original: bag chags kyi khams spong bar byed do //🔽bsam pa'i khams sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: bag chags kyi khams spong bar byed do // bsam pa'i khams sbyong bar byed do //
translated: It abandons the realms of habitual tendencies.🔽It purifies the realms of thoughts.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
translated: It increases the realms of superior intention.

original: chos kyi khams rgyas par byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi khams rgyas par byed do //
translated: It expands the realms of phenomena.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par rtogs par byed do //
translated: It realizes the realm of nirvāṇa.

original: dgos pa bcu po de dag yongs su sgrub bo //
analyzed: dgos pa bcu po de dag yongs su sgrub bo //
translated: It accomplishes these ten purposes.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O Son of the Victorious One!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te /
translated: are the bodhisattvas’ minds.

original: bcu gang zhe na /🔽'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin cing ston pas /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin cing ston pas /
translated: What are the ten?

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni sa lta bu'o //🔽sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya chen po'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni sa lta bu'o // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya chen po'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pas /
translated: The bodhisattvas’ minds are like the earth, for they hold and show the roots of virtue of all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas’ minds are like the ocean, for they enter into the ocean of the vast wisdom of all the buddhas, without edge or center.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho ba la 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i @297b phyir; byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni ri bo chen po lta bu'o //🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing bsam pa dag pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho ba la 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i @297b phyir; byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni ri bo chen po lta bu'o // kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing bsam pa dag pa dang ldan pas /
translated: The bodhisattvas’ minds are like great mountains, for they are established in the highest roots of virtue that transcend the world, in order to establish all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nor bu rin po che lta bu'o //🔽chos thams cad la rab tu rno bas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nor bu rin po che lta bu'o // chos thams cad la rab tu rno bas /
translated: The bodhisattvas’ minds are like jewels, for they are free from the afflictions and are endowed with pure intentions.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rdo rje lta bu'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rdo rje lta bu'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas’ minds are like diamonds, for they are very sharp with regard to all phenomena.

original: bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi sgul bas /
analyzed: bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi sgul bas /
translated: It cannot be shaken by any demons, non-Buddhists, or opponents.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni ri'i rgyal po rdo rje'i khor yug shin tu brtan zhing mi shigs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni ri'i rgyal po rdo rje'i khor yug shin tu brtan zhing mi shigs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas’ minds are like the king of mountains, the outer perimeter of the vajra, which is extremely stable and indestructible.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pas /
translated: It is unstained by any worldly phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni padmo lta bu'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni padmo lta bu'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas’ minds are like lotuses.

original: bskal pa thams cad du 'byung ba dang / mthong bar dka' bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni me tog au du ma wa ra lta bu'o //
analyzed: bskal pa thams cad du 'byung ba dang / mthong bar dka' bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni me tog au du ma wa ra lta bu'o //
translated: It appears in all kalpas and is difficult to see. The bodhisattvas’ minds are like the udumbara flower.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / rab rib kyi rmugs pa sel ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / rab rib kyi rmugs pa sel ba'i phyir /
translated: It dispels the darkness of ignorance, the thick gloom of the cataracts of the entire world.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nyi ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nyi ma lta bu'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas’ minds are like the sun.

analyzed: 'di ltar bsgrub par dka' ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas rlabs po che'i mos pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pas sna tshogs kyi mos pa dang / yid zhum pa med pas rgya chen po'i mos pa dang / chos zab mo'i tshul la zhugs pas zhi bar byed pa'i mos pa dang /
translated: They are the aspiration of the great wave of the roots of merit that are difficult to accomplish through application; the aspiration of variety through accomplishing various ornaments; the aspiration of vastness through being undaunted; the aspiration of pacification through engaging in the way of the profound Dharma; the aspiration of the great light through the illumination of the Dharma; the aspiration of the great cloud through the rain of the Dharma; the aspiration of the great ocean through the accumulation of the Dharma; the aspiration of the great vajra through the indestructibility of the Dharma; the aspiration of the great mountain through being unshaken by any views; and the aspiration of the great king through the power of the Dharma.

original: sems rgya chen po bskyed pas yangs pa'i mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang / shugs su ldan pas rang gis skabs phye ba'i mos pa dang / bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu @302b 'joms pas mi 'phrogs pa'i mos pa dang /🔽las kyi rnam par smin pa la gcig tu nges pas shin tu gdon mi za ba'i mos pa dang / ci 'dod pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su ston pas mngon du gyur pa'i mos pa dang / stobs dang mi ldan pa med pa'i phyir /

translated: It is an interest that is open, since it is generated on a vast scale. It is an interest that is self-assured, since it is empowered by the blessings of the buddhas. It is an interest that is unshakable, since it completely overcomes all the works of Mara.

original: dus gang du 'dod par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par nod pa'i mos pa'o //

It is an interest that receives the prophecy of all the buddhas, since it is the attainment of enlightenment at any time desired, since it is not devoid of power.

analyzed: 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / 'che ba med pa dang / ngag gi las thams cad kyis ma bsgribs par chos ston pa'i tshul dang ldan pas /

translated: He had eliminated all thoughts and analyses, and he never gave up his intention to ripen beings through the wisdom of omniscience. He was free of any joy that was not pure, and he never ceased to experience the mental bliss of joy from seeing all the tathāgatas.

translated: They have the wisdom that knows the faculties of all beings, whether superior or inferior. They have the skill in the different elements and the many elements. They have realized the Dharma that is taught according to superior, inferior, and middling aspirations.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul yongs su bstan pas / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba thams cad las rnam par ldang ba dus la @312a *//

original: 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang / mi zad pa'i sems can gyi khams tshad med pas dang / mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pas dang / mi zad pa'i bskal pa 'grangs pa tshad med pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang / mi zad pa'i sems can gyi khams tshad med pas dang / mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pas dang / mi zad pa'i bskal pa 'grangs pa tshad med pa dang /

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi tha snyad mtha' yas shing tshad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs tshad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi tha snyad mtha' yas shing tshad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs tshad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa ste /
translated: It is because the conventions of all beings are immeasurable and limitless, the body of the thus-gone ones is immeasurable, the melodious voice of the thus-gone ones is immeasurable, the strength of the thus-gone ones is immeasurable, and omniscient wisdom is immeasurable.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ji tsam du tshad med pa de tsam du tshad med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the realm of space is immeasurable, the bodhisattva should gather the equipment of the path to that extent.

original: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa de ltar mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi 'tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa de ltar mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi 'tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the dharma-element is without end or middle, the bodhisattva should gather the equipment of the path to that extent, without end or middle.

original: ji ltar sems can gyi khams mi zad pa de ltar mi zad par byang chub @313a *//🔽sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //🔽ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa de ltar mu med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sems can gyi khams mi zad pa de ltar mi zad par byang chub @313a *// sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o // ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa de ltar mu med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the realm of sentient beings is inexhaustible, the bodhisattva should gather the equipment of the path to that extent, without exhaustion.🔽Just as the world-realms are limitless, the bodhisattva should gather the equipment of the path to that extent, without limit.

original: ji ltar bskal pa grangs su 'grang zhing bstan pa mi zad pa de ltar 'gro ba thams cad du mi zad par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bskal pa grangs su 'grang zhing bstan pa mi zad pa de ltar 'gro ba thams cad du mi zad par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the eons are innumerable and inexhaustible, the bodhisattva should gather the equipment of the path to that extent, without exhaustion in all worlds.

original: ji ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi tha snyad mtha' yas pa de ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra dang tha snyad la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa mtha' yas par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //🔽ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa de ltar 'gro ba dang / zhing dang / dus dang / sems can dang / bskal pa thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs shing /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi tha snyad mtha' yas pa de ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra dang tha snyad la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa mtha' yas par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o // ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa de ltar 'gro ba dang / zhing dang / dus dang / sems can dang / bskal pa thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs shing /
translated: Just as the infinite conventional expressions of all beings are infinite, so the bodhisattva should gather the equipment of the path by means of infinite accomplishments by means of the wisdom that engages the sounds and conventional expressions of all beings.

original: tshad med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the body of the Tathagata is immeasurable, so the bodhisattva should gather the equipment of the path by means of the immeasurables, filling all beings, fields, times, sentient beings, and kalpas.

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs tshad med pa de ltar byang chub sems dpas tshig gi lam gcig brjod pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par khyab cing /

translated: Just as the melody of the Buddha's speech is immeasurable, so the bodhisattva should gather the equipment of the path by means of the immeasurables, filling all of the realm of phenomena without exception by means of a single utterance of the path of words.

original: sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar byed pa'i lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar byed pa'i lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: I will gather the accumulations of the path that brings understanding to all the realms of sentient beings.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs @313b tshad med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //🔽ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de ltar tshad med par byas te /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs @313b tshad med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o // ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de ltar tshad med par byas te /
translated: Just as the powers of the thus-gone ones are immeasurable, so too should the bodhisattvas who are steadfast through the powers of the thus-gone ones gather the accumulations of the path.

original: byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the wisdom of omniscience is immeasurable, so too should the bodhisattvas gather the accumulations of the path in an immeasurable way.

analyzed: bsnan pa med pa dang / dbri ba med pa bsgom pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'jug pa med pas /

analyzed: bsgom pa med pa dang / rnam par bsgom pa med pa bsgom pa dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad dang bral bas /

original: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa bsgom pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin nyid nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa khong du chud pas de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma nyams par bsgom pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa bsgom pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin nyid nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa khong du chud pas de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma nyams par bsgom pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir /
translated: the meditation on the undifferentiated dharmadhātu; the meditation on suchness and the limit of reality without decline, through understanding suchness and the limit of reality to be equal to the end of space;🔽the meditation on the vast wisdom of the bodhisattvas, through the uninterrupted power of formation;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes yangs pa bsgom pa dang / chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes yangs pa bsgom pa dang / chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur te /

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi rtse dga' la dga' dgod pa dang / sems can dang 'dres shing 'bur ldog pa byed kyang /

original: sems kyi skad cig gcig la yang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid mi 'dor ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan lnga pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig gcig la yang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid mi 'dor ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan lnga pa'o //
translated: yet not abandon the bodhisattva’s samādhi of equanimity even for a single instant—this is the fifth ornament of the path.”

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang ma 'dres shing 'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin yang /
analyzed: gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang ma 'dres shing 'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin yang /
translated: Moreover, although the bodhisattvas are unadulterated by any worldly phenomena and have gone beyond the world,

original: sems can bsgral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can bsgral ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to liberate sentient beings,

original: pha rol tu mi 'gro ba'i lam yang mi gtong ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan drug pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu mi 'gro ba'i lam yang mi gtong ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan drug pa'o //
translated: they do not abandon the path that does not lead to the other shore. This is the sixth path ornament.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi ye shes snang ba la zhugs pa'i lam la gnas kyang /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi ye shes snang ba la zhugs pa'i lam la gnas kyang /
translated: Moreover, although the bodhisattvas abide on the path that is the illumination of the wisdom that is in accord with reality,

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can phyir zlog pa'i phyir lam ma yin pa dang / lam ngan pa yang gnon la /
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can phyir zlog pa'i phyir lam ma yin pa dang / lam ngan pa yang gnon la /
translated: in order to turn back sentient beings who have entered bad paths, they tread on paths that are not paths and bad paths,

original: lam des 'khor ba 'dzin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: lam des 'khor ba 'dzin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: but they do not hold samsara to be such a path.

original: des dag par yang mi sems pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan bdun pa'o //
analyzed: des dag par yang mi sems pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan bdun pa'o //
translated: They do not think that it is pure. This is the seventh path ornament.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu tshul khrims legs par bsrungs pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu tshul khrims legs par bsrungs pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: Moreover, the bodhisattva is always endowed with the perfect observance of discipline.

original: de bzhin gshegs @315b pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la rten pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan yang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs @315b pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la rten pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan yang /
translated: And by relying on the pure discipline of the tathagatas, he is endowed with physical, verbal and mental actions that are irreproachable.

original: tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: However, in order to ripen beings who have broken their discipline,

original: so so'i skye bo tha mal ba'i spyod pa thams cad ston cing /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo tha mal ba'i spyod pa thams cad ston cing /
translated: he may display all the behavior of ordinary, common people.

original: byang chub sems dpa' lam la rten pas bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lam la rten pas bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang /
translated: The bodhisattva, by relying on the path, has perfected all the pure accumulations of merit.

original: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / dbul bar skyes pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / dbul bar skyes pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: However, in order to turn away all beings who have entered the paths of the hells, the animal realm, the world of Yama, the states lacking leisure and poverty,

original: de dag gi lam du skyes pa yang ston la /
analyzed: de dag gi lam du skyes pa yang ston la /
translated: They also show the paths of those who are born in the higher realms,

original: lam de dag la yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: lam de dag la yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan brgyad pa'o //
translated: but they are not really engaged in those paths. This is the eighth aspect of the bodhisattvas’ ornamentation of their path.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa /
translated: “Moreover, the bodhisattvas have attained the unhindered eloquence that does not depend on others with regard to all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la ye shes snang bas rnam par lta ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la ye shes snang bas rnam par lta ba /
translated: They observe with the light of wisdom all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: They are blessed by all the thus-gone ones.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang / lus gcig tu gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang / lus gcig tu gyur pa /
translated: They are the single body of the Dharma body of all the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi snying po'i tshul can dgongs pa'i snang ba khong du chud pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi snying po'i tshul can dgongs pa'i snang ba khong du chud pa /
translated: They are the way of the essence of the Dharma of all sentient beings, and they have realized the light of their intent.

original: theg pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa /
analyzed: theg pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa /
translated: They abide in the sameness of all vehicles.

original: @316a *// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul la mngon par mos pa /
analyzed: @316a *// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul la mngon par mos pa /
translated: They are devoted to the domain of all the buddhas.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba /🔽sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ngor lta ba /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ngor lta ba /
translated: He is pleasing to all beings.🔽He looks at the realms of all beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du bya ba yin yang /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du bya ba yin yang /
translated: He is the master of all beings.

original: chos yongs su btsal bar bya ba rgyun mi gcod cing /
analyzed: chos yongs su btsal bar bya ba rgyun mi gcod cing /
translated: He never stops searching for the Dharma.

original: ngo mtshar gyis yongs su zin par snang bas /
analyzed: ngo mtshar gyis yongs su zin par snang bas /
translated: He appears to be filled with wonder.

original: sri zhu'i las thams cad la gnas te /
analyzed: sri zhu'i las thams cad la gnas te /
translated: He remains in all the duties of service.

original: mkhan po dang / slob dpon du ston kyang /
analyzed: mkhan po dang / slob dpon du ston kyang /
translated: He is the teacher of preceptors and masters.

original: de nyid 'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid 'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa yin te /
translated: He is the master of all beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i lam la shin tu gnas pa yin pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i lam la shin tu gnas pa yin pas /
translated: Bodhisattvas are skilled in means and are well established in the bodhisattva path.

original: de dag ni thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i thabs sems can rnams la yongs su ston te /
analyzed: de dag ni thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i thabs sems can rnams la yongs su ston te /

original: 'di ni lam gyi rgyan dgu pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lam gyi rgyan dgu pa'o //
translated: This is the ninth ornament of the path.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'dus shing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'dus shing /
translated: Furthermore, the bodhisattvas had gathered all roots of virtue.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad thob pa /
translated: They had attained all the bodhisattva activities and miracles.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba /

analyzed: chos thams cad la dbang ba'i dbang phyug gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa /

original: chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i thabs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i thabs dang ldan pa /
translated: They were endowed with unattached and stainless means.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du @316b thogs pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du @316b thogs pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par ston pa /

analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par bskor ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang gzugs bdog pa /

analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa dang ldan pa /
translated: They were endowed with the supreme perfection of the lord of all phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad rab tu thob pa /

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhing du skye ba yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhing du skye ba yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in manifesting birth in the realms of all beings.

analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yul gcig tu gyur pa yang yin la /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod cing /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid kyang rnam par mi spong /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i las las kyang rnam par mi ldog /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i nye bar len pa yang 'chad par mi byed /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa las kyang phyir mi ldog /

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yang thogs par mi byed /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yang thogs par mi byed /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs kyis kyang yongs su skyo ba med cing /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs las kyang ring du 'phang ba ma yin te /

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O jinaputras!

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ltar byang chub @317a *//
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo la rnam par lta ba de lta bus ni /
translated: In that way, the bodhisattvas’ conduct is uninterrupted, and through the gateway of the view of omniscience,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur du 'byung ba'i phyir te /

translated: “O jinaputras!

analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These ten

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi rgyan te /
translated: are the adornments of the bodhisattvas’ path.

original: de dag la gnas shing /

translated: They are

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam rin po che'i rgyan bla na med pa thob par gyur kyang /

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: “O jinaputras!

analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po la nan tan du byed pa'i rkang pa'o //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa ste /

analyzed: de dag la gnas shing /

analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa la gcig tu mos shing yid ches pas mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir /
